metadata.title: CVE-2017-9754 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The process_otr function in bfd/versados.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, does not validate a certain offset, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of this file during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29-1ubuntu1').
